properties.name: First Starbucks Unionization
properties.description: In December of 2021 first Starbucks votes to unionize in in Buffalo. They will begin to negotiate a contract for better pay, benefits and working conditions.

properties.name: First Amazon Unionization
properties.description: In April of 2022 the first Amazon Warehouse unionizes in Staten Island despite union busting and by the company.

properties.name: Kellogs Labor Strike
properties.description: Kellog's workers strike for 11 hours after a 5 year contract expired. The strike ended in October of 2021 when unionized workers voted on a 5 year contract.

properties.name: John Deere Labor Strike
properties.description: John Deere workers go on strike at midnight for a month after their contract expired. They negotiated for higher wages and better benefits as the company has seen a 38% increase in profits over the last 30 years. An agreement was reached for a 10% pay increase.
